title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies: Personalized Motivational Design Strategies for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their basic psychological needs profile (autonomy, competence, relatedness).
Learners can propose at least two customized learning strategies aligned with their motivation types.
Learners can maintain learning motivation by applying self-regulation strategies in online learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
